name: Thoodiam
description:
A 7 day roguelike for the 7DRL 2016 challenge. Reach the bottom of the dungeon, get the Thoodiam, and take it back to the surface.

This game is complete and playable but balance and interesting gameplay are not guaranteed.

Combat mechanics and most item properties are stolen from Sil.

"Thoodiam is pretty fun, until it abruptly isn't." -- A 7DRL reviewer
